survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee awareness and satisfaction with sustainable office practices implemented in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the sustainable office practices currently implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to gauge familiarity levels. Ensure options are balanced.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons; randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the sustainable office practices currently implemented in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office practices are you aware of in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to assess awareness of specific practices.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes; include 'None of the above' to capture negative responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office practices are you aware of in your workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the recycling programs in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Recycling programs' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Likert scale for satisfaction; include 'Not applicable' for those unaware.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons; display only if 'Recycling programs' was selected in Q2.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the recycling programs in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Recycling programs' in Q2

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable practices would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather qualitative feedback; limit response length to 200 characters.

script.question_text: What additional sustainable practices would you like to see implemented in your workplace?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the recycling bins provided in your office?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Recycling programs' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Frequency scale to measure engagement with recycling programs.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons; display only if 'Recycling programs' was selected in Q2.

script.question_text: How often do you use the recycling bins provided in your office?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Recycling programs' in Q2

questions.question_text: Do you believe your workplace is committed to sustainability?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure perceived commitment to sustainability.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons; randomize option order.

script.question_text: Do you believe your workplace is committed to sustainability?

questions.question_text: Have you participated in any workplace sustainability initiatives or events?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge participation.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons; include 'Not sure' for clarity.

script.question_text: Have you participated in any workplace sustainability initiatives or events?

questions.question_text: If yes, which initiatives or events have you participated in?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather specifics; limit response length to 150 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field; display only if 'Yes' was selected in Q7.

script.question_text: If yes, which initiatives or events have you participated in?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your workplace's sustainability practices to others?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure advocacy potential.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons; randomize option order.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your workplace's sustainability practices to others?

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in sustainable office practices?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to identify obstacles; limit response length to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in sustainable office practices?
